p: It is widely believed that climate change is beginning to manifest in the form of changing weather and flooding (Kundzewicz et al. 2014). The Global Climate Risk Index ( 2016) asserts that between 1995 and 2014, more than 525 000 people died worldwide and losses of more than $ 2.97 trillion were incurred as a direct result of over 15 000 extreme weather events.
